name: Suspicious Certutil Command Usage
description: Detects a suspicious Microsoft certutil execution with sub commands like 'decode' sub command, which is sometimes used to decode malicious code
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
query: (process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Dd][Ee][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Dd][Ee][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Hh][Ee][Xx]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Uu][Rr][Ll][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Vv][Ee][Rr][Ii][Ff][Yy][Cc][Tt][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Dd][Ee][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Dd][Ee][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Hh][Ee][Xx]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Uu][Rr][Ll][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Vv][Ee][Rr][Ii][Ff][Yy][Cc][Tt][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\ .*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Pp][Ii][Nn][Gg].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*\ \-decode\ * OR *\ \-decodehex\ * OR *\ \-urlcache\ * OR *\ \-verifyctl\ * OR *\ \-encode\ * OR *\ \/decode\ * OR *\ \/decodehex\ * OR *\ \/urlcache\ * OR *\ \/verifyctl\ * OR *\ \/encode\ *) OR (process.executable:*\\certutil.exe AND process.command_line:*ping*))`
